resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An external API for real-time stock data fetching, including endpoints for stock quotes, financials, and market trends.
resource_dependency.authAPI: External authentication service supporting user login, registration, and session management.
resource_dependency.pdfExportLibrary: A client-side library for PDF generation such as jsPDF or html2canvas.
resource_dependency.chartingLibrary: A charting library like Chart.js or D3.js for rendering market trend visualizations.

function: Fetch all stock-related data dynamically from backend APIs and display it on the frontend.
static_description: The main page displays a white background with navy UI components. It includes a header bar, a search input field for entering stock codes or names, a section for displaying results, and a loading spinner icon when data is being fetched.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search button triggers an API call to retrieve stock data based on user input.
Pressing Enter while focused on the search input triggers the same API call as clicking the search button.

resource_dependency.userTableSchema: CREATE TABLE users (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash TEXT NOT NULL);
resource_dependency.reportHistoryTableSchema: CREATE TABLE report_history (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id), stock_symbol VARCHAR(10), report_format VARCHAR(50), content_selection JSONB, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

function: Provide a backend API service connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables to support authentication and store report history.
static_description: Backend server initialized with connection settings pointing to a local PostgreSQL instance using provided credentials. Tables are set up for storing user accounts and report generation history.

resource_dependency.searchInputField: <input type='text' id='stock-search' placeholder='Enter stock code or name'>

function: Allow users to input stock codes or names through a dedicated search interface.
static_description: A centered search bar with a navy-themed input field labeled 'Enter stock code or name', accompanied by a navy-colored search button titled 'Search'. Both elements are placed within a white container.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Search' button sends the entered value to the backend API for processing.
Pressing Enter inside the input field initiates the same action as clicking the search button.

function: Enable users to customize their report preferences via a form interface.
static_description: Below the search area lies a collapsible form panel containing two sections: one for selecting report format from predefined options and another for choosing desired content sections. All controls use navy styling over a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Generate Report' button submits selected preferences along with the current stock identifier to trigger report creation.

function: Produce customized stock reports tailored to user selections and make them available for download.
static_description: Upon successful submission, the generated report appears either inline via iframe preview or directly downloads depending on chosen format. A navy-styled download link is visible once processing completes.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the download link retrieves and saves the file locally in the selected format.

function: Present essential stock information including company details and ticker symbols clearly.
static_description: A card-style layout shows company logo placeholder alongside text fields listing company name, ticker symbol, sector, industry, and CEO. Styled with navy headings against a clean white backdrop.

function: Visualize historical price movements and market trends using interactive charts.
static_description: A responsive chart canvas embedded in a navy-bordered container displays line graphs representing stock performance over time. Color palette uses navy tones for consistency.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over chart points reveals tooltips showing date and closing price values.

function: Include relevant financial metrics such as earnings, revenue, and key valuation ratios.
static_description: Tabular view lists quarterly or annual financial figures including earnings per share, total revenue, and important financial ratios. Headers styled in navy font on white background.

function: Apply consistent branding across the entire site using a white background with navy-colored UI components.
static_description: All pages utilize a minimalist design featuring a pristine white background complemented by rich navy accents throughout buttons, headers, and interactive elements.

resource_dependency.responsiveGridSystem: CSS Grid or Flexbox-based layout adapting to screen sizes

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across desktop and mobile devices.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between full desktop views and compact mobile screens using CSS media queries and flexible grid systems without compromising usability or visual appeal.

resource_dependency.sessionManagementMiddleware: JWT-based middleware ensuring authenticated access to protected routes

function: Implement secure user authentication system managing access control and tracking past reports.
static_description: Dedicated login/signup forms appear before accessing core features. Authenticated sessions persist via tokens stored securely in HTTP-only cookies.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting valid credentials redirects users to the dashboard where they can access previously generated reports.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Server-side logic to convert HTML/CSS content into downloadable documents

function: Offer multiple export formats enabling easy sharing and offline access to generated reports.
static_description: Post-generation, users see clearly marked links allowing immediate download in PDF, HTML, or CSV formats. Each option retains consistent navy styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a format prompts browser-native download behavior delivering the requested document version.

resource_dependency.realTimeWebSocketAPI: WebSocket endpoint providing live updates for subscribed stock prices

function: Deliver timely and accurate stock insights leveraging real-time data streams.
static_description: Active stocks show small 'Live' badges next to pricing info indicating ongoing updates. WebSocket ensures instantaneous refresh of displayed values without manual reloads.

resource_dependency.errorMessageComponent: Invalid stock code or data unavailable.

function: Gracefully handle errors arising from invalid inputs or missing data sources.
static_description: Prominent error message appears below search bar whenever invalid ticker is submitted or no matching records found. Message styled in red but integrated harmoniously with overall navy-white theme.

function: Provide clear feedback during asynchronous operations involving data retrieval or report generation.
static_description: Rotating spinner graphic overlays affected areas during active requests. Positioned centrally above semi-transparent mask maintaining focus until completion.
